name: deepkit-starter
description: A starter template for building applications with Deepkit Framework - includes TypeScript, Vite, Vitest, Docker, and best practices
author: Eram <eram@weblegions.com>

scripts.build: docker build --build-arg "BUILD_TS=$(node -e 'console.log(new Date().toISOString());')" --target prod -t deepkit-starter:latest . && docker build --build-arg "BUILD_TS=$(node -e 'console.log(new Date().toISOString());')" --target scan . && docker build --build-arg "BUILD_TS=$(node -e 'console.log(new Date().toISOString());')" --target logs --output type=local,dest=./build-logs .
scripts.clean: npm run rimraf -- -q dist build build-logs coverage node_modules .cache .vitest *.log *.cpuprofile
scripts.test: npm run lint && node script/run-vitest.js run
